member.name: D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER
member.summary: Specifies the level of support for programmable sample positions that's offered by the adapter.

member.name: D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER.D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Indicates that there's no support for programmable sample positions.

member.name: D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER.D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER_1
member.summary: Indicates that there's tier 1 support for programmable sample positions. In tier 1, a single sample pattern can be specified to repeat for every pixel ( parameter NumPixels = 1) and ResolveSubResource is supported.

member.name: D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER.D3D12_PROGRAMMABLE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS_TIER_2
member.summary: Indicates that there's tier 2 support for programmable sample positions. In tier 2, four separate sample patterns can be specified for each pixel in a 2x2 grid ( parameter NumPixels = 1) that repeats over the render-target or viewport, aligned on even coordinates .
